body: I don't think it makes sense to call `mat2` self: when one does `mat.sspaddmm(...)` then `mat` would have to be dense and not sparse. I can try to see if I can enable sparse type dispatch in native functions.
body_html: I don't think it makes sense to call mat2 self: when one does mat.sspaddmm(...) then mat would have to be dense and not sparse. I can try to see if I can enable sparse type dispatch in native functions.
